Key Match Events: Adolis García homered to right (368 feet)
Bregman homered to left center (393 feet)
Lowe homered to right (358 feet), Garver scored
Alvarez singled to center, Bregman scored
García homered to left center (340 feet)
Post-Match Reflections: Adolis García and the Rangers are heading to the World Series
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Game 7 of the ALCS
The game was played at Daikin Park in Houston, Texas
The Rangers are going to the World Series for the first time since 2011
